breakingChangesNotes:
### In order to use the new mail rules command you will need to reauthenticate your instance

#### If you are using The XSOAR app
You just need to recreate your instance keys by using the link in the relevant integration documentation.

#### if you are using a self deployed app
You need to add a new permission to your app `MailboxSettings.ReadWrite` (please check in the relevant integration which scope is requierd).
Then create a new secret and continue the authorithation proccess.

#### if you are using Azure Managed Identities
Add the relevant `MailboxSettings.ReadWrite` permission to the relevant user.
